pixels-journey-store-seo-description: Welcome to Pixels Journey, where cutting-edge AI-generated art meets premium metal posters. Transform your space with stunning, one-of-a-kind designs that inspire and captivate, reflecting our commitment to innovation and artistic excellence.

pixels-journey-customer-service-descript: Get in touch with Pixels Journey Customer Service for support with your orders, shipping information, and more. We're here to help you with any questions or concerns.
pixels-journey-customer-service-keywords: Customer service, Pixels Journey support, Order assistance, Shipping information, Help and support, Contact us, Customer inquiries, Returns and exchanges, Billing questions, Technical support, Customer care, Service center, Help desk, Client support, Customer service hotline
pixels-journey-blog-seo-description: Stay updated with the latest insights, tips, and trends in AI-generated art. Explore our blog for inspiration, tutorials, and stories behind the stunning designs available at Pixels Journey.

order-confirmation: By clicking the Place Order button, you confirm that you have read, understand and accept our Terms of Use, Terms of Sale and Returns Policy and acknowledge that you have read Pixels Journey's Privacy Policy.

update-profile-info: View and update your profile information, including your name, email, and phone number. You can also update your billing address, or change your password.
update-shipping-addresses: View and update your shipping addresses, you can add as many as you like. Saving your addresses will make them available during checkout.
view-orders-status: View your previous orders and their status. You can also create returns or exchanges for your orders if needed.

contact-us-description: If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
gift-voucher-description: Surprise your loved ones with a gift card! Perfect for any occasion.
sign-in-to-view-your-pixels-journey-acco: Sign in to view your Pixels Journey account
contact-us-success-message: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
fast-delivery-description: Your package will arrive in 3-5 business days at your pick up location or in the comfort of your home.
simple-exchanges-description: Is the fit not quite right? No worries - we'll exchange your product for a new one.
easy-returns-description: Just return your product and we'll refund your money. No questions asked – we'll do our best to make sure your return is hassle-free.
